TextBlock.Text: ERROR: Fuel Unstable; Deploying liquid to counteract Progress 00%: ------------------------- Progress 36%: |||||||||---------------- Progress 84%: |||||||||||||||||||||---- Liquid Deployment Complete
ERROR: Liquid Frozen; Fuel Remains Fatal / \ / ! \ ----- Retrieving Warning; Translating; Translation Complete

I plea that this message reaches you in time. The fuel contained within this seed is highly dangerous and contact with it is certain to end in your demise. You must rapidly locate to a safe distance or submerge yourselves until it dissipates. Your continued survival depends on it!
